abstract.t: The GRE specification contains a Key field, which MAY contain a valuethat is used to identify a particular GRE 'flow'. This specificationdefines a new Mobile IP extensions that is used to exchange the valueto be used in the GRE Key field.This specification also introduces a new extension, called the GREType extension, which is used during registration to signal the GREtype that will be used for the Mobile Node's session. This extensionis deemed important in order to allow the Mobility Agents to setupthe necessary protocol interfaces prior to receiving the mobile'straffic.
